section.p: The ship’s captain says, ‘I’ll take you but you should be warned - it’s a dangerous place we’re travelling to. You’d better be sure you can handle it - if you’re not at least a master of your profession, I’d advise against. It’s up to you, though.’

You must have Over the Blood-Dark Sea to travel to Copper Island.
If you still want to go,
cross off the 30 Shards and turn to 99
in that book.
If you decide not to go, return to the section you came from.
